name: Goat Cheese, Bacon, and Scrambled Egg Brunch Wrap
author: FrackFamily5 CA—>CT
summary: We love scrambled egg sandwiches and I'm always putting new combos together. This one's flavor profile is perfect for brunch. It's sweet, savory, salty, tart, and fresh. You can make one or a bunch.
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, 5 to 8 minutes
While bacon cooks, spray a small skillet with cooking spray; warm over medium-high heat
Pour into the skillet; cook, stirring frequently, until scrambled and set, about 5 minutes
Heat tortilla in a microwave until soft and pliable, about 15 seconds
Spread goat cheese evenly over the tortilla
Layer olives, 1 slice of bacon, egg, spinach, and remaining bacon slice in the center of the tortilla
